abstract: Cisco Systems has created a virtual switch that performs the functions of its networking hardware using software alone.
snippet: Cisco Systems has created a virtual switch that performs the functions of its networking hardware using software alone.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems has found a way around all that bothersome metal and plastic used to make its networking gear. The company has concocted a virtual switch that it’s selling in tandem with VMware, the leader in virtualization software and a close Cisco partner.

headline.main: Look, Ma, No Hardware: Cisco’s Virtual Switch
